actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 and the Public Rangeland Improvement Act of 1978, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 and the Public Rangeland Improvement Act of 1978 to provide for grazing leases, permits, and fees for the Charles M. Russell National Wildlife Refuge in Montana.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Land Policy and Management Act of 1976 and the Public Rangeland Improvement Act of 1978, and for other purposes.
